name: tournament_matches_by_date
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool tennis_live_data.
Tool description: Tennis data for top competitions around the world including tournaments, matches, results, and rankings.
API description: Lists all matches for a given `tournament_id` on a given `date`. This is a quick summary view of matches on the given date without result or detailed player info.

date.description: The date for which to retrieve the matches, formatted as 'YYYY-MM-DD'.
